attributes.action: Cancel the impending price hike in fuel duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We pay too much already for the price of fuel this must be stopped before we find ourselves with more fuel protests, as the cost of fuel is so expensive the oil companies must bear the cost through their massive profits if anyone is to bear the cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
